document.full_text: the stars of 'spider-man: turn off the dark,' reeve carney and jennifer damiano, are doing their all to sell the new version that opens next week.
document.title: a superhero's day (and a damsel's) never ends
lines_and_colors: the stars of 'spider-man: turn off the dark,' reeve carney and jennifer damiano, are doing their all to sell the new version that opens next week.
